servicemap.title: Service Map
servicemap.text: The Service Map of the Helsinki Metropolitan Area helps users in finding an event on the map
servicemap.expandAriaLabel: Show cookie information related to the Service Map
servicemap.checkboxAriaDescription: Cookies are used to display the Service Map of the Helsinki Metropolitan Area

cookies.matomo: A cookie of the Matomo statistics system
cookies.linkedevents: A cookie to authorise the retrieval of events
cookies.i18next: A cookie to remember the website language selection
cookies.servicemap_analytics: A cookie of the Matomo statistics system for the Service Map.
cookies.servicemap_ga: A Google analytics cookie for the Service Map

expiration.session: The session cookie is deleted once the user exits the page
